title: Facing federal hostility, supervised consumption site points to 1,900 overdose reversals
description: OnPoint, the nation's first supervised drug consumption site, vows to continue its approach to harm reduction.
content: OnPoint, the nation's first supervised drug consumption site, vows to continue its approach to harm reduction.
